attributes.title: DO NOT DO IT
attributes.review: Ever since I downloaded this app Iâ€™ve had nothing but problems. First, my skin started to get a strange orange hue. Then, I noticed that I started to stand in odd positions, and no matter what I did I couldnâ€™t remember how to stand properly. Then, I noticed that my words started coming out stranger and stranger. Itâ€™s almost as if I forgot the proper pronunciation of words. I also started combining words and making up my own. Then, I noticed that I started becoming more and more narcissistic. I thought I knew everything. I knew more than anyone. Iâ€™ve studied greatly. The experts know nothing. Itâ€™s FAKE NEWS. Then I started noticing I felt the urge to become very sexually inappropriate with women. Then, I noticed my hair started to fall out, so I started doing a very odd combover type thing. Slowly, my brain has started becoming larger and larger. Iâ€™m now a stable genius, and Iâ€™m capable of doing anything! Next, I set a bunch of cops and National Guard on peaceful protesters so I could take photos. Next I felt a very strong urge to cut taxes for the rich while increasing taxes for the poor. Then I decided I should take away healthcare for everyone I know, but especially for transgender people. Then I decided I should run a bunch of scams, like a fake school, and take millions of dollars from kids and young adults. Then I decided to praise white supremacists a good people while calling black people thugs and violent people. This is because all of a sudden I had a really strong urge to become racist af. I refuse to rent to people of color or hire them for jobs. This app has ruined my life.. Does all of this sound very bad and odd, and make me sound like an awful person?.. well if you think so, then youâ€™d also know that these are all perfect examples of what Donald Trump does on a daily basis ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ ACAB. attributes.title: This app tracks you and everything you do!
attributes.review: This app puts something on your phone that tracks you! I went to an office building that had a Starbucks attached and after I got a notification that said that if I donated the money I spent at Starbucks to Trump I could help make America great again. Then after I went to Ralphâ€™s supermarket, it did the same thing! I ordered lawn chairs on Amazon and it gave me a list of books to read while Iâ€™m relaxing on my new lawn chairs! So itâ€™s tracking me online too!  I turned off notifications on my phone and now it is texting me. It knows EVERYWHERE I go and every website I visit and even suggested I recommend the app to a personal friend I had been texting! This app is nefarious! DELETING!
